tha-ap82:2.4: padmapupphāni → tīṇi pupphāni (bj, pts-vp-pli1); padumapupphāni (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap82:19.3: Tepi padmā → te visuddhā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap82:21.4: nibbānaṁ → nibbāṇaṁ (bj) | pāpuṇissati → phassayissati (bj); passayissati (pts-vp-pli1, mr)
tha-ap82:22.4: anubhosiṁ tisampadā → anubhosiṁ tisampadaṁ (bj); anubhosin ti sampadā (pts-vp-pli1); anubhūyanti sampadā (mr)
